entry.title: Where do I start?
entry.summary: A beginner in Bitcoin wants to understand the protocol and make progress in Java to become a good developer. Jorge Tim√≥n suggests improving tests and documentation, as well as cloning, compiling, and changing things while reading the code. Mike Hearn advises that tasks in Bitcoin Core are complicated, but there are plenty of wallet apps and more straightforward projects available. Additionally, there is information about BPM Camp and a dashboard for monitoring support. The conversation takes place on the Bitcoin-development mailing list.
